import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
	image = ft.Image(
		src="picture.png",
		width=150,
	)
	
	page.add(image)

ft.app(main)

import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):
	img = ft.Image(src="./picture.jpg")
	
	page.add(img)

ft.app(main)

def main(page: ft.Page):

	page.add(img)

ft.app(main)
